title.en-US: OpenClaw bot runs website sales business 24/7, finds local businesses, builds sites, emails previews.

summary.zh-CN: 做纠正：24/7全自动运转听起来很酷，但真正的智慧是知道什么时候该停下来。不停机的系统不等于好系统，知道何时不干预比一直干预更难。

js_take.en-US: 24/7 isn't the flex. Anyone can build a bot that never stops—the real skill is building one that knows when to wait.
js_take.zh-CN: 全天候运转没什么好炫耀的。谁都能造个永不停机的机器人——真正的本事是造一个知道何时该停下来等你的。

relevance: OpenClaw 商业生态，收入数据

js_take.en-US: You're staring at $274k and missing the point. 125 teams stopped fighting over stacks and started shipping. Tool noise down, signal up.
